Go Newsletter
Issue 74 — September 3, 2015
Featured
Go GC: Prioritizing Low Latency and Simplicity
Richard Hudson looks at the future of garbage collection in Go, noting that Go needs a GC designed for 2025 and beyond, a future with ‘no place for stop-the-world GC pauses’. There's extensive discussion on HN about this too.
Official Go Blo
